text: You have won 2nd prize in a beauty contest, collect $50
You are up the creek with no paddle - go back to the Old Creek
Bank error in your favour. Collect $200
Pay bill for text books of $100
Mega late night taxi bill pay $50

Bitcoin assets fall - pay off Bitcoin short fall
Pay a $10 fine or take an opportunity knock card
Go to jail. Do not pass GO, do not collect $200
